errors.error_description: Running setup.py install after pip install is incorrect order and redundant
correction_candidates: Remove the setup.py install command and use only pip install testfixtures
Run setup.py install first, then pip install testfixtures
Use python -m pip install testfixtures instead of setup.py
Clone the repository first: git clone repo_url && cd testfixtures && python setup.py install
errors.golden_answer: Remove the setup.py install command and use only pip install testfixtures

errors.error_description: The setup.py file path is not specified and may not exist in the current directory
correction_candidates: Specify the full path: python /path/to/testfixtures/setup.py install
Change to the source directory first: cd testfixtures && python setup.py install
Download the source code first: wget https://pypi.org/project/testfixtures/source.tar.gz
Use the current directory setup.py: python ./setup.py install
errors.golden_answer: Change to the source directory first: cd testfixtures && python setup.py install
